source.name: Commercial and Non Commercial Movements by Airport: Beginning 1977
source.description: The dataset presented in this forum is annual data. The Port Authority  collects monthly data for domestic and international flight, passengers and aircraft equipment type from each carrier at JFK, EWR, LGA and SWF. The data is aggregated into quarterly and annual in an Oracle database and it forms the basis for estimating revenues, airport planning TSA workload schedules and Passenger Facility Charges (PFC) at the Port Authority Airports.
